label: 新撰万葉集
本: Sugawara no Michizane and the Early Heian Court . University of Hawai'i Press . 1994
見出し読み: しんせんまんようしゅう
見出し読み_mod: しんせんまんようしゅう
説明文: [An anthology attributed to Sugawara no Michizane,] which consists of two chapters, each containing over one hundred waka by various authors, with every waka followed by a poem in Chinese on the same theme (p. 221). [菅原道真]
